linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distro with glibc 2.24+ (should be almost any distribution version released after 2016)
  • Processor: Most quad core CPUs, some dual core CPUs
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least 1 gamepad is required. One player can use the keyboard, the remaining players must to use gamepads (controllers). Spaced Out should run on most modern computers, even many of the ones not meant for gaming

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Most quad core CPUs, some dual core CPUs
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Almost anything with OpenGL 4.3 or higher (most graphics cards made in the last 12 years)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least 1 gamepad is required. One player can use the keyboard, the remaining players must to use gamepads (controllers). Spaced Out should run on most modern computers, even many of the ones not meant for gaming
